official_title: A bill to amend the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 to double the amount of earnings permitted to persons receiving disability annuities.

summary.text: Amends the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 to increase from $2,400 to $4,800 the amount of earnings permitted to persons receiving disability annuities.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 to double the amount of earnings permitted to persons receiving disability annuities.
